content.raw: Just weighing in to say that I've experienced the same issue when mounting a UR5 arm on a Husky vehicle in gazebo7. The arm uses the PositionJointInterface and essentially acts as an anchor that prevents the vehicle from moving properly and causes it to float and descend slowly if dropped. This issue does not exist in gazebo2.
content.html: Just weighing in to say that I've experienced the same issue when mounting a UR5 arm on a Husky vehicle in gazebo7.
